description.brief: ROS-Package for libelas, library for Efficient LArge Scale stereo matching

package.description:
This is a ROS-Package for libelas, a library for visual odometry created by Andeas Geiger from the Institute of Measurement and Control Systems at Karlsruhe Institute of Technology.
Apart from the original libelas sources, this package contains a CMakeFile for easier integration into the ROS build system.
Please note that this code is licensed under GPL. For a commercial usage, please contact Andreas Geiger directly (see http://www.cvlibs.net/software/libelas.html).
